--- In gladiator@yahoogroups.com, "Shigeki Miyake-Stoner" 
<shigekims@a...> wrote:
> You must have been playing in skirmish mode... either that or 
cheating... :)

Now, now, I got to the point where a legit fire elemental (on one 
team) or a legit thief (on another team) could take out those nameless 
characters easily.  The key was keeping the team together so that my 
clerics could constantly heal my team.
